page.title: 06Astronomy on Todmorden Moor
page.content: The{Amateur Astronomy Centre}has begun to develop in the last two or three years on the middle site of the former pipe works on Bacup Road. It was established by a group of members with the intention of developing the site over a number of years. So far the group has built a{Camera Obscura,}a {Planetarium}and a{Thirty inch {telescope.}The group is in the process of building an{observatory}to house a forty inch telescope with a darkroom, meeting room and other facilities. It is hoped that this will be finished by the end of 1985. There are further plans to develop the site with an { {educational centre and shop}to attract non-members to the centre. It is also intended to mount the{thirty inch {telescope}as a mobile telescope making it (currently) the largest mobile telescope in the world.
